mapper.select: SELECT ci.*, p.name AS product_name, p.image AS product_image, p.specifications AS product_specs, p.stock AS product_stock FROM cart_item ci LEFT JOIN product p ON ci.product_id = p.id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
SELECT * FROM cart_item ci LEFT JOIN cart c ON ci.cart_id = c.id WHERE ci.id = #{id} AND c.user_id = #{userId}
